description:
After their manager`s attempt to arrange a romantic dinner for the two of them, a rainy day leaves Shinozaki feeling under the weather, and Shiori decides to check in on him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Despite Appearances, I`m More the Big Sister Type.
Kou Miete Igai to Onee-san Desho?
On ne dirait pas, mais je ferais une bonne épouse, non ?
こう見えて意外とお姉さんでしょ?
